type.en-US: Phone Numbers in the United States
Social Security Numbers in the United States
ZIP Codes in the United States

func.func: var r = ''; var req = https.get('https://www.zipcodeapi.com/rest/' + encodeURIComponent(config.settings.zipcodeapi.key) + '/info.json/' + encodeURIComponent(str), (res) => { res.on('data', (d) => { r += d; }); res.on('end', function() { cb(r); }); });
func.cb: (str) => { var data = JSON.parse(str); console.log('* ' + data.city + ', ' + data.state); }
